thread.title: Volatility Swings Reach New Milestone

author: Asjylyn Loder
title: Volatility Swings Reach New Milestone
text:
Wall Streetâ€™s fear gauge has hit a record-breaking bout of turbulence.
The Cboe Volatility Index, a measure that investors use to track the speed and severity of market moves, rose as much as 27% Thursday as U.S. stocks fell for a second consecutive day.
Stock-market reversals have made 2018 one of the most tumultuous on record for the volatility...
